verbs.description: [V: looking] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG1: at the massive colorado blizzard of october 1997] [ARGM-ADV: if you lived in colorado during october 1997] then you probably remember one of the worst and deadliest blizzards to hit colorado the storm hit on oct 24 and continued to pound the front range and eastern plains with several inches of snow through oct 25 colorado 1997
